proposal: Diving into the world of PEAS, where volatility isn't a threat but an opportunity to earn real yield. 🌱 Imagine turning market swings into your advantage with every pod you wrap or buy. With 28 holders in the ETH network, it's clear the community sees value in harvesting from market ebbs and flows. Why not amplify this with tools that let anyone deploy a Lottery or DEX, sharing revenue while expanding the ecosystem? Let's grow together, one pod at a time.
